column4: http://pastie.org/541001 <----can any1 tell me how do I add this packages to my repository?
copy paste those lines into synaptic
you need to also add the key to the repos,which i will tell you how to
yes its a message, paste it
I pasted it in there then pressed ok ....then 'reload' then error given ...then closed window
i want to see that error
okay is late now don't know how to get it back (error message)
can u paste again i didnt see it'
i want you to paste the error you get
in terminal type this    gpg  --keyserver  subkeys.pgp.net --recv-keys 9220067F
in terminal type this    gpg  --keyserver  keyserver.ubuntu.com  --recv-keys 9220067F
aah keys created so type this sudo apt-get add -
first one was correct, you must have got  a message keys imported
ya its fine all is good
is still giving same erro unless you want to do something different
did u type command sudo apt-get add -
sorry type this sudo apt-key add -
copy paste it , will work now
well now your new packages will appear in synaptic what else
now will have to follow all instructions you gave me before...
no i tell you easy method for future
when you add a new repository, and reload, you get a message with a long ID ( numbers and alphabet)s , copy the last eight digits in a txt file
the very first message you got after adding the repo
then from synaptic>repositories>keys> import key file and point it to the file and it will import the keys
what is this paste? i cant open
what is it about? isnt it working now?
is just to fix my audio playback  from very begining
the new repository you added with give you some extra packages which you can install
ya follow those instructions from the original paste you sent
question is do I mark all for installations or not?
but it will mark all repos for upgrade
thanks for you patience ...you hear me....thakns
which is fine,you should always update your system
what problem u have with sound?
problem I was having with audio playback with skype: could not hear anything with or without mic...or even if I were to make a call.....
will reboot and chck for changes in my test pc....will right back
